required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Validation of a French Version of the PISQ-R
clinical_study.official_title: Validation of a French Version of the PISQ-R: a Tool for Evaluating the Sexuality of Patients With Urinary Incontinence or Pelvic Organ Prolapse

brief_summary.textblock: The main objective of this study is to perform the linguistic validation of the french version of the PISQ-R questionnaire in a population of sexually active (or not) patients who have undergone surgery (or not) for stress urinary incontinence or genital prolapse.

detailed_description.textblock:
Step 1: Establish a French translation of the original questionnaire (English> French.
Step 2: Perform a first set of comprehension tests with a panel of 15 patients.
Step 3: Establish a revised questionnaire.
Step 4: Perform a second series of comprehension tests with a panel of 10 other patients.
Step 5: Determine the final questionnaire.
Step 6: Perform a back-translation (French> English.
Step 7: Send the final version of the questionnaire and the questionnaire back-translated to the specific committee of the IUGA for final approval.

primary_outcome.description: These tests assess patient understanding of the original formulation and patient understanding of the various terms used: a list of proposed rewording suggested by patients is made.

arm_group.description: Patients suffering from pelvic organ prolapse and/or urinary incontinence and/or fecal incontinence. See inclusion/exclusion criteria.

study_pop.textblock: Patients suffering from pelvic organ prolapse and/or urinary incontinence and/or fecal incontinence.

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- The patient is able to read and understand French
- The patient must be insured or beneficiary of a health insurance plan
- Patients suffering from pelvic organ prolapse and/or urinary incontinence and/or fecal incontinence.
Exclusion Criteria:
- Patient is pregnant
- The patient is under judicial protection, under tutorship or curatorship
- The patient does not understand French

facility.name: CHU de Nîmes - Hôpital Universitaire Carémeau

clinical_study.keyword: linguistic validation of the PISQ-R questionnaire
